original: intros n m H. unfold lt_bool in H. destruct n. - intros _. apply Nat.le_0_l. - destruct m. + discriminate. + apply Nat.leb_le. simpl in H. apply andb_true_iff in H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. apply Nat.leb_le in H1. apply Nat.leb_le in H2. apply Nat.le_trans with (m := S n). * apply Nat.le_succ_l. * apply Nat.le_succ_l.
